catalog_info.title: Analysis of Multivariate and Longitudinal Data
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO245.
catalog_info.description: The multivariate normal distribution, Hotelling's T2, MANOVA, repeated measures, the multivariate linear model, random effects and growth curve models, generalized estimating equations, multivariate categorical outcomes, missing data, computational issues for traditional and new methodologies.
